replies.msg:
Thank you for your recent enquiry requesting information held on Her Majesty’s Passport Office records regarding your BNO passport.

I can confirm that you were issued with passport number xxxxxxxxxxxx on 08/07/1996 in Hong Kong; this passport expired on 08/07/2001.

This department cannot advise if a person is eligible to apply for a BNO passport

For any enquiries on how to renew / replace your BNO passport, please visit the following website: www.gov.uk/overseas-passports

BDTC直到1997前一路都有簽發
BDTC 1987年7月1日停止左簽發 因為護照通常係10年期限 所以呢10年間仲有有效嘅BDTC係1987前簽發咗嗰啲嘅生效期 最後啱啱好1997年6月30日全部失效

replies.msg:
錯

Bdtc87-97一路都有簽發
呢到bno post久唔久就有人貼當時BNO嘅申請表
上邊講到明可以選擇申請BDTC護照或者BNO護照
不過BDTC護照會短過10年期限九七年就會到期

呢到都有人貼過佢92年嘅bdtc

係咪即係我以前有英國passport，但97前無申請到bno??咁既case仲有無得救？

藍絲老母真係多撚謝你

replies.msg:
由於所有BDTC passports 最遲在30/06/1997 expire，如果本passport係8/7/2001到期，基本上有兩個可能性：
1.該passport 是BC passport;
2.該passport 是BNO passport.

如果你要查自己可否取得BC and/or BNO passports （或其他types of british nationality嘅passports, 但我認為應該一係BC, 一係BNO, 一係2本也eligible to apply), 佢已經俾咗條link 你，
可自行看看.

replies.msg:
"This department cannot advise if a person is eligible to apply for a BNO passport"

佢唔會答你能否申請BC, or BNO, or 兩本也可. 你要找另一部門詢問.

我可以答你的是，因為你的expired British passport 是超越1997年之後，所以一定不是BDTC passport.

replies.msg:
如果你自己確定沒有BC (相信亦唔會有BPP等特別英籍), 可直接上網renew BNO passport (但要上網先向HM passport office報失passport, 然後當作"Apply your First Adult Passport"處理[因你的passport已expired超過10年以上]).

網上有好多renew BNO passport教學, 你可自己找一找.
